narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Asap Taxi is a Taxi provider based in Syracuse, NY. From 2018-01 through 2018-09, this provider received $155K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 414 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 7.3× the national median for S0215 (S0215), at $156 per claim vs. the median of $21. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
94% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: S0215 (S0215). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2018-09, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
